Uses of Package
shared.model.board

  • Packages that use shared.model.board 
    Package Description
    shared.model  
    shared.model.board  
    shared.model.items  
    shared.model.player  
  • Classes in shared.model.board used by shared.model 
    Class and Description
    Board
    The Board Class is used to store all the information about the game board including the map with its hexes, vertices, edges, and tradeports.
    Hex
    The Hex class is used to store what kind of resource can be gained through it, what roll value is necessary to gain the resources, and whether the resources will be stolen by the robber Operations are provided for (1) checking for the robber, and placing him or taking him away from the hex
    (3) Getting and setting the hexType
    (4) Retrieving the Hex location
    TradePort
    The TradePort class stores the kind of trade port available to improve trade rates for a player.
  • Classes in shared.model.board used by shared.model.board 
    Class and Description
    Board
    The Board Class is used to store all the information about the game board including the map with its hexes, vertices, edges, and tradeports.
    Edge
    The Edge class is used to store whether an edge has a road owned by a player Operations are provided for placing a road on the edge and detecting if the edge has a road.
    EdgeSide 
    Hex
    The Hex class is used to store what kind of resource can be gained through it, what roll value is necessary to gain the resources, and whether the resources will be stolen by the robber Operations are provided for (1) checking for the robber, and placing him or taking him away from the hex
    (3) Getting and setting the hexType
    (4) Retrieving the Hex location
    ModEdgeDirection 
    TradePort
    The TradePort class stores the kind of trade port available to improve trade rates for a player.
    Vertex
    The Vertex class is used to store whether a vertex has a municipal built on it.
  • Classes in shared.model.board used by shared.model.items 
    Class and Description
    Edge
    The Edge class is used to store whether an edge has a road owned by a player Operations are provided for placing a road on the edge and detecting if the edge has a road.
    Vertex
    The Vertex class is used to store whether a vertex has a municipal built on it.
